titleStmt.title: The Whigs laid open, or, An honest ballad of these sad times To a mery tune, called Old Symon the King.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T. at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Now the plotters & plots are confounded,".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
